abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn City Armory cornerstone collection consists of the contents of a sealed lead box laid into the Brooklyn City Armory cornerstone during construction in 1858 and unearthed upon demolition in 1930. Items in the collection provide a picture of the social, cultural, and political climate of Brooklyn in the late 1850s.
